issue.title: [R] Implement lubridate's interval type and lubridate functions as.interval(), interval() and %--%
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In lubridate, an interval is a pair of dates.  We could implement this as an extension type.
